reviews.sentence: Good and Bad. Stayed here during Christmas week to be near family. Staff was very friendly and the location could not have been more convenient to PDX restaurants and a lovely walk along the Columbia River. Nice breakfast amid homelike fireplace setting. Negatives were minor but noticeable. Our sons sofabed was not ready when we arrived late after a long flight. Noise from the airport was quite loud beginning at 70 each morning. No corkscrew in kitchenette. One TV did not work the other was fine and the heat switch on the hair dryer did not work. Hair dryer was replaced very quickly.

Stay here. 11 adults had a family reunion here for a week. Great gathering space staff food ease of location to ocean Mt St Helens wineries Columbia River. Thought the outdoor space with firepit and lots of tables and chairs perfect for larger groups. Rooms were clean and spacious. Highly recommended.

Family Stay. We stayed at the Homewod suites as a family while attending a wedding. We had 3 rooms for all the married couples and a family with 2 children. The ease of having breakfast on site and the large rooms made it an easy stay even in the 100 degree weather. The pool was a big attraction. We also had people needing to be picked up and returned to the Portland airport which was a very convenient. A great stay for the family.

Ms Lou. Attended my niece wedding in Oregon and checked in overnight in Homewod Suites by Hilton in this location with my family. First of all I like their suite wide and comfortable. second. I like their breakfast. Actually there is nothing to dislike in the suite and breakfast and services it is well equipped. The staff are courteous and helpful too. One thing though you need a map to drive to your suite. all in all it is a good hotel and good experience.

Nice Place to Stay Will go back. Though it is a long way from the airport it is worth the trip because it is situated among many restaurants and is is very nice hotel. Rooms are large and clean. You can walk to the restaurants though we drove to a couple of them located in a large nearby shopping center.

Amazing staff wonderful accommodation. We loved our entire week long experience at this hotel. Very well maintained property. clean everything worked well and our suite with fireplace and kitchen was spacious and ideal for our family. Even the pool and spa were never crowded so it was a pleasure to actually use them. The most amazing part though were their staff. Always nice smiling helpful and super friendly. The location was great too in a quiet spot very close to everywhere we wanted to be across the street from two wonderful restaurants with views of the river and fantastic walking path along the rivers banks. We are coming back and we are staying at the same wonderful hotel.

Great overnight stay with family. Family of 5 hotel rooms are tricky for us but this stay was great. Room was clean and roomy at least as hotels go staff very professional and friendly. Breakfast good with fresh berries evening refreshment an unexpected pleasant surprise. Great stay.

Warm Welcome in Vancouver. Perfect weekend gathering spot for our family great location very friendly staff comfortable and very clean rooms. breakfast every morning really hit the spot they also have a cocktail hour at night which is comp. great deal anyway you look at it.

Would stay again. This hotel was everything we hoped it would be. Clean and close to all things we needed to do shopping and family. Food was good. Enjoyed the lobby area and outside sitting area. Only bad thing for us personally was we like a harder mattress so for us they were too soft.

Comfortable stay with extra hotel features. Clean and comfortable and perfect for our business stay which we combined with a leisure trip. Having the two separate areas made it easy for one of us to work while the other rested relaxed. The complimentary evening social was an added bonus. Only small complaint was that there was some noise for a period of time from the running toilet upstairs.

Stayed in room 204. Check the bathroom and crevices around the bed. There was a lot of dirt and dust on the floor and around the bed. My room was n’t vacuumed thoroughly and there were fecal stains on the outside of the toilet. Unfortunately it was a long day so my family and I wanted to rest. Luckily I brought clorox wipes so I wiped down the parts that needed cleaning. Housekeeping was gone for the day so we did n’t bother calling front desk for them to clean the bathroom. Sofa in room 204 needs to be updated. Overall we were able to sleep fine. If you update the sofa vacuum the floors and corners thoroughly including areas where you think most would n’t usually look and also clean the toilet both inside and outside then I would give this place a high rating. There is a nice restaurant right next door and the beach is walking distance.
Loved having a full kitchen as well as the separate bedroom. Location it was a quiet room. Since I was traveling alone l really appreciated that I was away from families with kids.

Hoop time. Staff was great except Owen. I do not appreciate being lied to. At 930 at night I called and asked when they would stop playing basketball as I have a newborn. Owen told me that they do n’t have any posted hours but typically shut everything down at 10 PM. So he said we would n’t have to ‘ deal with the noise ’ but for another 30 minutes. The next morning I walked out to see a sign that stated the basketball court was open from 9 AM to 10 PM at night. Whether this was in confidence or laziness does n’t matter as it kept me and my family awake. Other than this incident it was a great place to stay And the staff were extremely helpful and professional other than that one individual stated above.

Great Hotel. Love it. We had a 3rd floor King sized Bed suite we have discovered during the last few trips that usually when you get a KING bed you get standard sized pillows. The pillows here were offered in 2 sizes standard and slightly smaller and 2 different pillow firmness. Hugh suite lovely furnishings Kitchenette with dish towels and eating utensils. The toilet and shower tub were separate from the large counter sink area which worked well for both of us getting ready etc. Had great lighting for make up application. It was also way cheaper than staying on Portland. 13 the price of Portland. I thought the breakfast was great. They offered make your own waffles boiled eggs scrambled eggs sausage links or patties some kind of scrambled egg caseroleyumy bagels English muffins various types of bread for toast and croissants. Regular muffins different kind each day. yogurt and small fresh fruit for it as well as granola. other fresh fruit such as apples oranges and bananas. cold cereals. I thought their offering was plenty to choose from and it was tasty. Out of the places we stayed during our trip it was absolutely THE BEST. We love to hear airplanes coming and going. Hubby noticed the airplanes I did not. There was a couple of restaurants within walking distance that were really good.
My family was happy to stay.

Great Suite lodging close to downtown and Fort. We came into town for a wedding at Fort Vancouver. We did n’t want to stay in downtown Vancouver but wanted to be close so we could visit with other family members. This location was perfect. The rooms are clean and well appointed. Heard zero noise on a Saturday night. The desk staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Will stay again.

Like home. Rooms are more like apartments than they are a hotel. Spacious with lots of windows lighting up the rooms. Multiple buildings make it feel smaller and less impersonal and commercial. A very short walk to multiple restaurants bar and the Columbia river walk. Breakfast is cookie cutter Hilton which is n’t a real bad thing. Staff tripped all over themselves to take care of me. Some airport noise when fights land from the west but not enough to get in the way.

Wonderful. The area is beautiful the service was outstanding. My needs were met I do not have a single issue complaint. Will definitely stay there again. So glad my family was already staying there. Looking foward to my next trip.

Just okay “ double ” beds were SMALL. We had a suite two double beds and a pull out couch in living space but the “ double ” beds were surprisingly small even for two grandkids. They could have fit two queens in the space and it would have been better. The outdoor pool area is really nice though and the breakfast space was roomy with outdoor seating options. Staff was friendly as well. Only reason for lower rating was the smaller than normal “ double ” beds.

I loved staying here with my family. The grounds lobby and room were in great condition. I loved the outside patio area and enjoyed it each evening. The fire pit area was so enjoyable. I found the staff at this hotel extremely courteous and pleasant. Really impressed.

Home away from home. Spent 4 nights as part of a 40 member family reunion. Very nice hotel and amenities. Pool hot tub pickle ball basketball court. Members of family reunion of all ages had something to do. Great open patio grill area and plenty of seating. Breakfast items offered were plentiful and delicious. There was even pizza and wine beer on Thursday for happy hour. Saved us a dinner out. Used small but acceptable conference room for family activities and photo sharing. I highly recommend this hotel.
